short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension hides the WordPress admin bar and adds tools & links to the right-click context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension hides the WordPress admin bar and when logged into the WordPress site adds an option to the right click context menu to edit the page. 

If you click on the extension icon you will see addition options to add links so  you can quickly jump into the different sections of your site. 

You can also right click on any link in your WordPress front end menu and click the "Edit Page" link to jump right to that specific page for editing.

If you have custom post types in your front end menu, you will need to add that custom post type slug so that when you right click on a custom post type link in the menu, you can also jump to that specific post's edit page. 

If you have any problems with the extension, please DO NOT jump right into giving me a 1 star review. I plan on updating this extension when time permits. Please remember this is a FREE extension and should be given a chance to improve before giving 1 star reviews. I made this extension for my co-workers and I as we use sticky menu's in our websites we develop.
